${modID}:SatansGrudge.NAME: Satan's Grudge
${modID}:SatansGrudge.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL While in hand, lose 2 HP and gain as much ${modID}:Begrudged whenever a card is Exhausted.

${modID}:Clog.NAME: Clog
${modID}:Clog.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL While in hand, whenever a card is discarded, shuffle a *Clog into your draw pile.

${modID}:BadCode.NAME: Bad Code
${modID}:BadCode.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. Ethereal. NL When you draw this card, Channel 1 ${modID}:Brick.

${modID}:TheBigSad.NAME: The Big Sad
${modID}:TheBigSad.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. Unplayable. NL When you draw this card, enter ${modID}:Depression and Exhaust. NL Whenever you enter Wrath, ${modID}:Exhume this card and shuffle it into your draw pile.
